property.name: MappedProperty
property.description-key: Bound field for Model-Driven App form placement (not used internally)

property.name: stageAModelId
property.description-key: AI Model ID for Stage A (expects BotId input)

property.name: stageBModelId
property.description-key: AI Model ID for Stage B (expects botcomponents input)

property.name: stageCModelId
property.description-key: AI Model ID for Stage C (expects Instruction Input for agent instruction evaluation)

property.name: stageDModelId
property.description-key: AI Model ID for Stage D (generates PDF report from review results)

property.name: defaultBotIcon
property.description-key: Default icon for bots without custom icons

property.name: useTestHarness
property.description-key: Use sample data for testing instead of calling real AI models
